title: Mune ga Naru no wa Kimi no Sei Bangai-hen
original_name: 胸が鳴るのは君のせい 番外編
sinopse:
1-3. Mune ga Naru no wa Kimi no Sei Bangai-hen:

-   Hasebe-kun no Baai
-   Sweet Winter Lovers
-   Kawaru Koto Kawaranai Koto

4. Kimi ni Kogareru
5. Harukaze to, Hatsukoi
6. Natsu no Nioi, Fuwari
7. Furetai, Aki
8. Yuki, Tokidoki Suki
